confirmResetMessage: Are you sure you want to reset your points to 0? This action cannot be undone.
successMessagePointsReset: Your points have been reset to 0.
confirmImportMessage: Do you want to replace your current tasks and points with the imported ones? This action cannot be undone.
errorImportMessage: There was a problem importing the tasks. Make sure the file is valid.
importSuccessMessage: Your points and tasks have been successfully imported.
